title: Authorities announce traffic diversions in Dhaka for Victory Day celebrations
body: Traffic diversions will be enforced at Gabtoli and Bypile points on the Dhaka-Ashulia and Dhaka-Aricha Highways on the occasion of the Victory Day. According to the Superintendent of Police, Dhaka, the diversions will remain in effect from 3:00am to 9:00am on December 16. During this period, vehicle drivers have been advised to use alternative routes to avoid congestion and ensure smooth traffic flow. Meanwhile, the National Memorial will be open to the public from 9:00am on December 16 for paying tribute on Victory Day.
